■The tray bin is checked every
30m. Check it every 15m during
peak time.
■Wipe off any spilled food or
drink off of the top and the
door of the tray bin.

■Clean up food and drink spills
on the tray bin.
■Compress the trash in the tray
bin when necessary.
■Replace the pack liner before
it overflows.

■Make sure the pack liner is
invisible from the tray bin.
■Change the tray bins every
day and wipe with clean,
sterile washcloths.
